committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the restoration of survivor compensation to any widow or widower who has remarried if such remarriage is later dissolved by death, annulment, or divorce.

summary.text: Authorizes the restoration of survivor compensation under Federal retirement benefits to any widow or widower who has remarried if such remarriage is later dissolved by death, annulment, or divorce.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the restoration of survivor compensation to any widow or widower who has remarried if such remarriage is later dissolved by death, annulment, or divorce.
